about-me.title: About me
about-me.desc:
I am a web developer with more than {{ years }} years of commercial experience gained in the global polish software house.

My strongest point is Angular framework but I have also some experience with Node and MongoDB (private large app on production). I have developed some sample web applications (check my GitHub) implemented in React, Vue and REST API with Express. I am interested both in frontend and backend development.

My interests include non-fiction and popular science literature, ancient Greek and biblical exegesis.

I am also an author of extensive web platform apologetykabiblijna.pl, built and deployed on my own from scratch (Angular 2+, REST API with Node.js + Express, MongoDB, Firebase, Heroku).

work-experience.title: Work experience
work-experience.desc: Implementation complex web applications for loyalty management.
